pytma.Model¶

class pytma.Model(func=<function cumgauss>)¶

Class for fitting cumulative Gaussian functions to data

__hash__(self, /)¶

Return hash(self).

fit(self, x, y, initial=[0.5, 1])¶

Fit a Model to data.

Parameters
xfloat or array

The independent variable: contrast values presented in the experiment

yfloat or array

The dependent variable

Returns
fitFit instance

A Fit object that contains the parameters of the model.
